thread.section_title: Keepkey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keepkey | keepkey.com | 2 of 9
thread.title: Greg Penrose

author: Greg Penrose
title: Greg Penrose
text: My experience with Keepkey has been a positive one. When I ordered the Keepkey it sent was sent off promptly how ever the package was damaged in transit and was sent back to the shipper. When I contacted Keepkey to explain the situation they replied quickly and refunded my shipping cost and resent the package out the next day. Their customer service was of a good standard and it has been a pleasure doing business.
